title: Miracle Mile Upper Studio
posting_body: Terrific Miracle Mile location for this charming and bright upper studio apartment with air conditioning.
Newly refinished hardwood floors and lots of light from large windows.
This apartment has high coved ceilings and a new ceiling fan.
There is also a newly renovated bathroom with period subway tile and a pedestal sink.
There is a stove and refrigerator included in the kitchen area which also features many cabinets and drawers as well as a drainboard and sink.
We pay for gas, sewer and water.
Easy permit parking on the street for residents (permit costs $35 per year).
Convenient walking distance to shops, restaurants and Starbucks.
Must see this great apartment renting for $1,450 per month.
